titles.title: A bill to amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to establish a safety net program for commercial fishermen and aquaculture producers.
Commercial Fishing and Aquaculture Protection Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
